info.name: hydws
info.description: Retrieve data via hydws (hydraulic data web service)

exec: pm.test("Validate number of hydraulics returned", function () {

var jsonresponse = JSON.parse('[{"fluidviscosity": {"value": 0.5}, "fluiddensity": {"value": 8.0}, "bottompressure": {"value": 73.0}, "topflow": {"value": 42.0}, "toppressure": {"value": 73.0}, "bottomflow": {"value": 42.0}, "fluidph": {"value": 7.0}, "bottomtemperature": {"value": 303.0}, "datetime": {"value": "2010-12-01T12:00:00"}, "toptemperature": {"value": 273.0}}, {"fluidviscosity": {"value": 0.5}, "fluiddensity": {"value": 8.0}, "bottompressure": {"value": 73.0}, "topflow": {"value": 42.0}, "toppressure": {"value": 73.0}, "bottomflow": {"value": 42.0}, "fluidph": {"value": 7.0}, "bottomtemperature": {"value": 303.0}, "datetime": {"value": "2010-12-09T12:00:00"}, "toptemperature": {"value": 273.0}}, {"fluidviscosity": {"value": 0.7}, "fluiddensity": {"value": 8.0}, "bottompressure": {"value": 83.0}, "topflow": {"value": 52.0}, "toppressure": {"value": 83.0}, "bottomflow": {"value": 55.0}, "fluidph": {"value": 8.0}, "bottomtemperature": {"value": 313.0}, "datetime": {"value": "2010-12-09T13:00:00"}, "toptemperature": {"value": 290.0}}]').sort((a, b) => (a.publicid > b.publicid) ? 1 : ((b.publicid > a.publicid) ? -1 : 0));
var jsonData = pm.response.json().sort((a, b) => (a.publicid > b.publicid) ? 1 : ((b.publicid > a.publicid) ? -1 : 0));
